articles.name: Learning React: Insights so far
articles.excerpt: My journey with React — from initial challenges to rewarding AHA moments. Insights, tips, and lessons learned for anyone diving into this powerful library.

articles.name: How to stop being scared: Learning to love code
articles.excerpt: Overcome coding fears by embracing a beginner's mindset, starting small, and celebrating progress. Learn to love coding as a skill, not a hurdle, step by step.

articles.name: Imposter syndrome – how do I deal with it?
articles.excerpt: Imposter syndrome feels overwhelming, but I’m learning to manage self-doubt and find confidence in my journey, one step at a time.
